attributes.action: back an additional direct train service from Chingford to Stratford using the Hall Farm Curve track beyond St. James Street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The scheme would require the re-opening of the Hall Farm Curve track beyond St. James Street. 

The service would provide a valuable interchange at Stratford with the Central, Jubilee, DLR and overground services. A real benefit to East London!
